application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions:
Reason : 1 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to condition 5 (Disposal of Surface Water) to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority that the proposed development would ensure that adequate drainage facilities are provided, reduce and mitigate the effects of flood risk in accordance with policy DM10 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.
Reason : 2 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to condition 6 (Surface Wa-ter Attenuation And Storage) to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Plan-ning Authority that the proposed development would prevent the increased risk of flooding, reduce and mitigate the effects of flood risk in accordance with policy DM10 of the Development Management Policies Local Plan 2013.
Reason : 3 - Insufficient information has been submitted in relation to condition 14 (cycle stor-age) to demonstrate to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority there is provision of safe cycle storage facilities, to provide facilities for all the users of the site and in the interests of highway safety and sustainable transport and to ensure that cycle parking facilities would be available for all users of the site on immedi-ate occupation of any of the buildings in accordance with Policy T5 of the London Plan (2021), and policies DM1 and DM42 of the Harrow Development Manage-ment Policies Local Plan (2013).
description: Details pursuant to conditions 3 (demolition and construction logistics plan), 5 (disposal of surface and foul water), 6 (surface water attenuation and storage works), 14 (cycle storage) and 17 (refuse storage) attached to planning permission P/1004/19 dated 22/11/2019 for First floor extension and alterations to ground floor access
